abstract: The Deal celebrates its tenth year with a new section of its Web site, whose features include an interview with venture capitalist Fred Wilson on deal-making in the Internet bubble days.
snippet: The Deal celebrates its tenth year with a new section of its Web site, whose features include an interview with venture capitalist Fred Wilson on deal-making in the Internet bubble days.
lead_paragraph: It has been nearly a decade since The Daily Deal started covering the world of mergers and acquisitions, buyouts, venture capital and bankruptcy, and it’s chronicled plenty of ups and downs.

headline.main: A Trip in The Deal’s Way-Back Machine
